content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the complex pursuit of these dual purposes—instructing and pleasing the reader—contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the complex pursuit of these dual purposes—instructing and pleasing the reader—contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
